languages.text: [Напасть] "Мятежу против законной власти Империума нет оправдания. То, что ксеносы так легко манипулировали вами — признак слабости веры и малодушия. Приговор — смерть".

traits.locale_text: [Напасть] "Мятежу против законной власти Империума нет оправдания. То, что ксеносы так легко манипулировали вами — признак слабости веры и малодушия. Приговор — смерть".

languages.text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."
languages.original_text: [Напасть] "Мятежу против законной власти Империума нет оправдания. То, что ксеносы так легко манипулировали вами — признак слабости веры и малодушия. Приговор — смерть".

traits.locale_text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

[Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

[Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

[Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

languages.text: [攻击]“你们忤逆帝国的合法当局，这种行为没有任何借口可以掩饰。你们这么容易就遭到了异形的操纵，这说明你们的信仰非常薄弱。这样的罪行必须判处死刑。”
languages.original_text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

traits.locale_text: [攻击]“你们忤逆帝国的合法当局，这种行为没有任何借口可以掩饰。你们这么容易就遭到了异形的操纵，这说明你们的信仰非常薄弱。这样的罪行必须判处死刑。”

languages.text: [Atacar] «No hay excusa que justifique rebelarse contra la legítima autoridad del Imperium. El hecho de que los xenos les manipularan tan fácilmente solo demuestra la debilidad de su fe y su cobardía. Este crimen se castiga con la muerte».
languages.original_text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

traits.locale_text: [Atacar] «No hay excusa que justifique rebelarse contra la legítima autoridad del Imperium. El hecho de que los xenos les manipularan tan fácilmente solo demuestra la debilidad de su fe y su cobardía. Este crimen se castiga con la muerte».

languages.text: [攻撃する]「帝国の正当な支配者に逆らうなど、弁解の余地を与える者か。異種族にここまでたやすく操られたということは、お前は信念が弱い臆病者ということだ。この罪に対する判決は、死だ」
languages.original_text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

traits.locale_text: [攻撃する]「帝国の正当な支配者に逆らうなど、弁解の余地を与える者か。異種族にここまでたやすく操られたということは、お前は信念が弱い臆病者ということだ。この罪に対する判決は、死だ」

languages.text: [Angreifen] "Es gibt keine Entschuldigung für Aufruhr gegen die rechtmäßige Autorität des Imperiums. Dass ein Xenos Euch so einfach manipulieren konnte, zeigt Eure Glaubensschwäche und Eure Feigheit. Die Strafe für dieses Verbrechen ist der Tod."
languages.original_text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

traits.locale_text: [Angreifen] "Es gibt keine Entschuldigung für Aufruhr gegen die rechtmäßige Autorität des Imperiums. Dass ein Xenos Euch so einfach manipulieren konnte, zeigt Eure Glaubensschwäche und Eure Feigheit. Die Strafe für dieses Verbrechen ist der Tod."

languages.text: [Attaquer] « Rien ne peut justifier de se rebeller contre l'autorité de l'Imperium. Le simple fait que les xénos soient parvenus à vous manipuler aussi facilement atteste de votre total manque de foi et de votre couardise. La sentence pour un tel crime est la mort. »
languages.original_text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

traits.locale_text: [Attaquer] « Rien ne peut justifier de se rebeller contre l'autorité de l'Imperium. Le simple fait que les xénos soient parvenus à vous manipuler aussi facilement atteste de votre total manque de foi et de votre couardise. La sentence pour un tel crime est la mort. »

languages.text: [Saldır] "İmparatorluk'un meşru otoritesine karşı isyan etmenin bahanesi olamaz. Zenoların sizi böylesine kolay manipüle etmesi, inancınızın zayıflığının ve ödlekliğinizin göstergesidir. Bu suçun cezası ölümdür."
languages.original_text: [Attack] "There is no excuse for rebelling against the Imperium's rightful authority. That the xenos manipulated you with such ease shows your weakness of faith and cowardice. The sentence for this crime is death."

traits.locale_text: [Saldır] "İmparatorluk'un meşru otoritesine karşı isyan etmenin bahanesi olamaz. Zenoların sizi böylesine kolay manipüle etmesi, inancınızın zayıflığının ve ödlekliğinizin göstergesidir. Bu suçun cezası ölümdür."
